ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... want you gone, dead, away from here. ... some kind of spy device in here. Dark Mouse, instead you are to take Scorpinox and find a suitable lair or base.

::: Inferno tapped on the door agian ::: Royalty, I dont think there-

::: Megatron slammed the door open, crushing Inferno. He walked out and 
looked Hell Beast in the face :::

::: Megatron ::: Can I help you with something?

::: Hell Beast ::: Yes, weve come to search your quarters. Move, or get moved.

::: Megatron moved and Hell Beast, Jackle, and a healdess Inferno entered. 
They searced there room, and Inferno placed his head back on to his neck. :::

::: Megatron ::: Satisfied?

::: Hell Beast ::: we both know that I dont like you, and you dont like me. I 
want you gone, dead, away from here.

::: Megatron ::: What are you gonna do about it?

::: Hell Beast ::: For now, nothing. But were watching you.

::: Jackle nodded and with Inferno they continued to search the ship. After 
the door closed Megatron turned to his followers :::

::: Megatron ::: we need to find a base of our own....no doubt theyve planted 
some kind of spy device in here. Dark Mouse, instead you are to take 
Scorpinox and find a suitable lair or base.

::: With out there reply, Megatron walked to the supply closet and opened the 
door to reveal the hidded stasis Pod. He wondered how they were going to move 
it, and where. :::
